greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Cumulative sums of A010892.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,1).
formula: G.f.: 1/((1 - x)*(1 - x + x^2)). - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 11 2011
a(n) = -floor((n - 4)/6) - floor((n - 3)/6) + floor((n - 1)/6) + floor(n/6). - _John M. Campbell_, Dec 23 2016
mathematica: Table[-Floor[1/6 (-4 + n)] - Floor[1/6 (-3 + n)] + Floor[1/6 (-1 + n)] + Floor[n/6], {n, 0, 100}] (* _John M. Campbell_, Dec 23 2016 *)
results.author: _Mark Dols_, Sep 02 2009
ext: Offset corrected by _John M. Campbell_, Dec 23 2016
